prop.hangingpicture1.info:
A drawing depicting a beautiful scenary.
The lively grassfields seem to be the main focus. A small mountain is on the left, a lake on the right.
prop.hangingpicture2.info:
A drawing depicting a beautiful scenary.
 There seems to be no focus. A mountain on the left, grassfields in the middle, and a big lake on the right.
prop.hangingpicture3.info:
A drawing.
A crumbling mountain on the left, a dying forest in the middle, and.. a lake on the right. May they rest in peace.
